en.heading: FAQ and Contact
en.subHeading: Answering some of the most frequented asked questions and ways to reach out to us.
en.title: FAQ
en.description1: After going through to what Mosteiro de Landim has to offer, it's completely normal to have some questions. We've compiled some that are most frequently asked.

church.title: Can we use the church for celebrations?
church.description: You may but according to parish rules - it is mandatory to contact the parish priest in advance.

services.title: Is it possible to hand-pick specific services for a specific event?
services.description: Of course! Inclusively, you may only hire catering or decoration, etc.

time_limit.title: Are there any time limits for events?
time_limit.description: As there ar eno nearby neighbors, there shouldn't be a problem related with noise. However, we do impose a limit until 04h00. If you wish to exceed this, extra fees may apply.

travel.title: Is it easy to go there?
travel.description: Mosteiro de Landim boasts a privileged location, as it's just 30 minutes away from Porto. If you want directions, check below!

per_weekend.title: When are you open for weddings?
per_weekend.description: Mosteiro de Landim is open for any kind of event throughout the year! However, when it comes to weddings, we follow a one wedding per weekend schedule to organize everything on time and to ensure everything goes smoothly!

more.title: I still have some questions...
more.description: No problem! Just reach out to us (preferably by e-mail) and we'll help you out!
